verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Get up early in the morning.
It's movin' time. It's movin' time.
When you hear the sound of the trumpets,
It's movin' time. It's movin' time.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Time to get up, time to move on,
Time to move on in God, in God,
It's movin' time.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Ye have compassed this mountain for too long.
It's movin' time. It's movin' time.
Get up early in the morning.
It's movin' time. It's movin' time.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Time to go on up Moriah's hill...

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Time to go and set creation free...
